mapper.sql:
select contact_id contactId, contact_name contactName, contact_cellphone contactCellphone, contact_fixedphone contactFixedphone, contact_email contactEmail, contact_qq contactQq, contact_nick contactNick, contact_wechat contactWechat, contact_other contactOther, contact_address contactAddress, contact_company contactCompany, contact_descrip contactDescrip, contact_status contactStatus, contact_en_name contactEnName from fms_nb_contact_info t where t.data_owner = #{loginUserName}
and contact_id = #{requestObject.contactId}
) t where rownum <= #{limit}) t1 where t1.rn > #{offset}
select * from (select rownum rn, t.* from (
mapper.insert: insert into fms_nb_contact_info ( contact_id, contact_name, contact_cellphone, contact_fixedphone, contact_email, contact_qq, contact_nick, contact_wechat, contact_other, contact_address, contact_company, contact_descrip, contact_status, contact_en_name, data_owner ) values ( sys_guid(), #{requestObject.contactName}, #{requestObject.contactCellphone}, #{requestObject.contactFixedphone}, #{requestObject.contactEmail}, #{requestObject.contactQq}, #{requestObject.contactNick}, #{requestObject.contactWechat}, #{requestObject.contactOther}, #{requestObject.contactAddress}, #{requestObject.contactCompany}, #{requestObject.contactDescrip}, 'Y', #{requestObject.contactEnName}, #{loginUserName} )
mapper.update: update fms_nb_contact_info set ( contact_name, contact_cellphone, contact_fixedphone, contact_email, contact_qq, contact_nick, contact_wechat, contact_other, contact_address, contact_company, contact_descrip, contact_status, contact_en_name, data_owner ) = ( select #{requestObject.contactName}, #{requestObject.contactCellphone}, #{requestObject.contactFixedphone}, #{requestObject.contactEmail}, #{requestObject.contactQq}, #{requestObject.contactNick}, #{requestObject.contactWechat}, #{requestObject.contactOther}, #{requestObject.contactAddress}, #{requestObject.contactCompany}, #{requestObject.contactDescrip}, 'Y', #{requestObject.contactEnName}, #{loginUserName} from dual ) where contact_id = #{requestObject.contactId} and data_owner = #{loginUserName}
mapper.delete: delete from fms_nb_contact_info t where t.contact_id = #{requestObject.contactId}
